articles.content: In 2016, the legendary Japanese filmmaker Hayao Miyazaki was shown a bizarre AI-generated video of a misshapen human body crawling across a floor. Miyazaki declared himself ‚Äúutterly disgusted‚Äù by the technology demo, which he considered an ‚Äúinsult to life itself.‚Äù ‚ÄúIf you really want to make creepy stuff, you can go ahead and do it,‚Äù Miyazaki said. ‚ÄúI would never wish to incorporate this technology into my work at all.‚Äù Read full article Comments

articles.content: Ankit Khanal gets his news from News Daddy. More than 20 times a day, Khanal, a sophomore at George Mason University, opens TikTok to have the biggest stories of the day delivered to him by a bleach-blonde 26-year-old named Dylan Page, one of the leading faces in a growing community of news influencers. For mobile health app developers, this represents a massive opportunity to build more engaging, personalized experiences. Y
articles.content: Every day, millions of people check their wearables before they check their phones. Apple Watch shows recovery scores, Garmin tracks training load, Oura monitors sleep quality. For mobile health app developers, this represents a massive opportunity to build more engaging, personalized experiences. Yet most health app development teams struggle to integrate wearable data effectively. Despite the clear user demand and business value, wearable integration remains one of the biggest technical bottle

articles.content: This is today’s edition of The Download , our weekday newsletter that provides a daily dose of what’s going on in the world of technology. Meet the man building a starter kit for civilization You live in a house you designed and built yourself. You rely on the sun for power, heat your home with a woodstove, and farm your own fish and vegetables. The year is 2025. articles.content: Microsoft is making some changes to the File Explorer in Windows 11 that will make it less cluttered and launch faster. The latest Dev preview builds of Windows 11 include File Explorer preloading ‚Äúto help improve File Explorer launch performance,‚Äù and changes to the context menu to reduce the amount of space less commonly used actions take up. The preloading of File Explorer should hopefully mean Microsoft‚Äôs file and folder management tool launches faster on systems where performance is constra

articles.content: Sonos Black Friday deals present good opportunities to upgrade your home audio setup. A number of Sonos speakers and soundbars are on sale right now, including the Era 300 speaker , which is $100 off and down to $379. articles.title: DOGE is no more, and in its wake, only chaos
articles.description: In April, Elon Musk began backing away from his role as head of DOGE. By June, he was more or less fully gone from DC. In his wake, he left a power vacuum and significant ill will that has apparently led to the dissolution of DOGE eight months before its charter expires.  To call Musk‚Äôs [&#8230
articles.content: In April, Elon Musk began backing away from his role as head of DOGE. By June, he was more or less fully gone from DC . In his wake, he left a power vacuum and significant ill will that has apparently led to the dissolution of DOGE eight months before its charter expires. To call Musk‚Äôs DC tenure contentious would be an understatement. As a man accustomed to getting what he wants and functioning as a powerful executive, he swept through Washington with a figurative chainsaw, slashing budgets, fi
articles.author: Terrence O‚ÄôBrien
